 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָטַף‎</span>] **verb** ==drop, drip, figurative== (especially of prophet) discourse (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְטַף‎</span> ***drop, drip***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***drip***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***drop*** ([[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>Syr. Gr. § 105</sup>) etc.; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***colare*** (stillando), ***expercolare***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽטְפוּ‎</span> [[Judg.5.4|Judg 5:4]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָטָּ֑פוּ‎</span> [[Judg.5.4|Judg 5:4]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּטֹּף‎</span> [[Job.29.22|Job 29:22]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִטּפוּ‎</span> [[Joel.4.18|Joel 4:18]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּטֹּפְנָה‎</span> [[Prov.5.3|Prov 5:3]]; [[Song.4.11|Song 4:11]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹטְפוֺת‎</span> [[Song.5.13|Song 5:13]] — ***drop, drip***, usually transitive, with accusative, of clouds ***dropping*** water (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִ‎</span>), in storm [[Judg.5.4|Judg 5:4]], \|\| heavens v[[Judg.5.4|Judg 5:4]] (object omitted), [[Ps.68.9|Ps 68:9]] (***id.***; all theoph.); of hands ***dripping*** myrrh (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺר‎</span>) [[Song.5.5|Song 5:5]] in predict. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִטְּפוּ עָסִיס‎</span> [[Joel.4.18|Joel 4:18]] the mountains ***shall drip must***; figurative of (seductive) speech <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹפֶת תִּטּ‎</span> [[Prov.5.3|Prov 5:3]] the lips of the strange woman ***drop honey***, so perhaps [[Song.4.11|Song 4:11]] ([[BDB#Bu|Bu]] of kisses); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂפְתוֺתָיו נ‎</span> [[Song.5.13|Song 5:13]] ***his lips drip myrrh*** (perhaps of sweet breath). Intransitive only <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלֵימוֺ תִּטֹּף מִלָּתִי‎</span> [[Job.29.22|Job 29:22]] ***upon them my speech used to drop.*** **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִטִּיפוּ‎</span> consecutive [[Amos.9.13|Amos 9:13]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּטִּיף‎</span> [[Amos.7.16|Amos 7:16]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַטִּף‎</span> [[Mic.2.11|Mic 2:11]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִטִּיפ֑וּן‎</span> v[[Mic.2.6|Mic 2:6]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּטִּיפוּ‎</span> v[[Mic.2.6|Mic 2:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּטִּפוּ‎</span> v[[Mic.2.6|Mic 2:6]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַטִּיף‎</span> [[Mic.2.11|Mic 2:11]] — 

**1.** ***drip***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָסִיס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהַטּ‎</span> [[Amos.9.13|Amos 9:13]] and the mountains ***shall drip must*** (= **Qal** [[Joel.4.18|Joel 4:18]]). 

**2.** of speech, especially prophecy (without accusative): with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***, [[Amos.7.16|Amos 7:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִנָּבֵא‎</span>), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> toward, [[Exod.21.2|Exod 21:2]] (\|\| ***id.***), v[[Exod.21.7|Exod 21:7]] (\|\| ***id.***); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> ***concerning*** [[Mic.2.11|Mic 2:11]] compare v[[Mic.2.11|Mic 2:11]] — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתַּֿטִּפוּ יַטִּיכּ֑וּן לֹאיַֿטִּפוּ לָאֵלֶּה‎</span> [[Mic.2.6|Mic 2:6]] ***'talk not' — so they talk — 'they*** (read ye?) ***shall not talk of these things***' (where <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּטּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַטִּפוּ‎</span> reference to prophets).
